Package org.apache.mesos.offer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OfferRecommendation
    This interface encapsulates both a recommended Mesos Operation to be performed and an Offer on which the Operation should be performed.
    OfferRequirementProvider
    An OfferRequirementProvider generates OfferRequirements representing the requirements of a Container in two scenarios: initial launch, and update of an already running container.
    OperationRecorder
    The OperationRecorder is an Interface required by the OfferAccepter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeStringUtils
    Tools for converting Attributes into strings.
    AttributeStringUtilsTest
    Tests for AttributeStringUtils.
    CreateOfferRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos CREATE Operation.
    DefaultOfferRequirementProvider
    A default implementation of the OfferRequirementProvider interface.
    DefaultOfferRequirementProviderTest
    This class tests the DefaultOfferRequirementProvider.
    DestroyOfferRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos DESTROY Operation.
    DynamicPortRequirement
    This class allows the expression of a desire for a random port designated by a name which will be injected into the environment.
    DynamicPortRequirementTest
    This class tests DynamicPortRequirements.
    ExecutorRequirement
    An ExecutorRequirement encapsulates the needed resources an Executor must have.
    ExecutorRequirementTest  
    LaunchOfferRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos LAUNCH Operation.
    LogOperationRecorder
    Used as an offer acceptor.
    MesosResource
    A representation of a Mesos Resources.
    MesosResourcePool
    A representation of the pool of resources available in a single Offer.
    MesosResourcePoolTest  
    MesosTask
    A representation of a Mesos Task.
    OfferAccepter
    The OfferAccepter accepts OfferRecommendations.
    OfferAccepterTest  
    OfferAccepterTest.TestOperationRecorder  
    OfferEvaluator
    The OfferEvaluator processes Offers and produces OfferRecommendations.
    OfferEvaluatorTest  
    OfferRequirement
    An OfferRequirement encapsulates the needed resources an Offer must have.
    OfferRequirementTest  
    OfferUtils
    This class provides commonly used utilities for offer handling.
    OfferUtilsTest  
    RequirementUtils
    Implementations for common operations on Task/Executor/Resource requirements.
    ReserveOfferRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos RESERVE Operation.
    ResourceCleaner
    The Resource Cleaner provides recommended operations for cleaning up unexpected Reserved resources and persistent volumes.
    ResourceCleanerScheduler
    This scheduler performs UNRESERVE and DESTROY operations on resources which are identified as unexpected by the ResourceCleaner.
    ResourceCleanerSchedulerTest  
    ResourceCleanerTest  
    ResourceRequirement
    A ResourceRequirement encapsulate a needed Resource.
    ResourceRequirementTest  
    ResourceUtils
    This class encapsulates common methods for manipulating Resources.
    ResourceUtilsTest  
    TaskRequirement
    A TaskRequirement encapsulates the needed resources a Task must have.
    TaskRequirementTest  
    TaskUtils
    Various utility methods for manipulating data in TaskInfos.
    TaskUtilsTest
    This class tests the TaskUtils class.
    UnreserveOfferRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos UNRESERVE Operation.
    ValueUtils
    Utilities for manipulating Value protobufs.
    VolumeRequirement
    A VolumeRequirement encapsulates the configuration required for volume creation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VolumeRequirement.VolumeMode
    VolumeMode.
    VolumeRequirement.VolumeType
    VolumeType.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DynamicPortRequirement.DynamicPortException
    Exception thrown when attempting to create malformed DynamicPortRequirements.
    InvalidRequirementException
    An exception which describes an error in a provided set of Offer Requirements.
    TaskException
    This class encapsulates Exceptions associated with Tasks.
